vulpix.name: Vulpix
vulpix.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail.  Its tail splits from the tip as it grows older.

growlithe.name: Growlithe
growlithe.description: Very protective of its territory.  It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: If it looses crackling power from the electric pouches on its cheeks, it is being wary.

jolteon.name: Jolteon
jolteon.description: It controls 10,000-volt power and can raise all the fur on its body as if it were sharp needles.

ampharos.name: Ampharos
ampharos.description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away.  It acts as a beacon for lost people.

jynx.name: Jynx
jynx.description: Merely by beditation, the Pokemon launches a powerful psychic energy attack.

abra.name: Abra
abra.description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.description: Under a full moon, this Pokemon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

alley-strangler.name: Alley Strangler
alley-strangler.description: You never know what day might be your last.

fen-hauler.name: Fen Hauler
fen-hauler.description: Success is found where others fear to look.

fatal-push.name: Fatal Push
fatal-push.description: Instant: destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less.

shipwreck-moray.name: Shipwreck Moray
shipwreck-moray.description: Shipwrecks do wonders for the local fauna.

ice-over.name: Ice Over
ice-over.description: Slow the Consulate with whatever you've got!

hinterland-drake.name: Hinterland Drake
hinterland-drake.description: As a kid, I dreamed of flying on those wild drakes.

prey-upon.name: Prey Upon
prey-upon.description: It is the nature of the strong to survive.

aetherwind-basker.name: Aetherwind Basker
aetherwind-basker.description: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

hidden-herbalists.name: Hidden Herbalists
hidden-herbalists.description: In the cellars beneath Narnam House, a strange and deadly garden grows.
